member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Sql.FirewallRuleOperations
member.summary: The Windows Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing the server-level firewall rules for SQL Database servers.You cannot manage the database-level firewall rules using the Windows Azure SQL Database Management API; they can only be managed by running the Transact-SQL statements against the master or individual user databases. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/gg715276.aspx for more information)
